text: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I was wondering if you could provide me with Timothy's class schedule? I want to be more involved in his school life. Thanks
John, I've been trying to get in touch with Timothy's teachers, but I haven't had much luck. Can you help?
Is there a calendar of school events that I could have? I want to make sure I'm up to date with what's happening at Oakwood.
